strings.INFINITETOWER_WAVE_DESCRIPTION_BOSS_SCAV: A taste of your own medicine.
strings.ITWAVE_DESC_BASIC_ENIGMA: Your equipment changes every time it's activated.
strings.ITWAVE_DESC_BASIC_KIN: Monsters will be of only one type.
strings.ITWAVE_DESC_BASIC_EVOLUTION: Monsters have additional items during this wave.
strings.ITWAVE_DESC_BASIC_SACRIFICE: Monsters have a chance to drop items on death.
strings.ITWAVE_DESC_BASIC_METAMORPH: Play as a random survivor for this wave.
strings.ITWAVE_DESC_BASIC_HONOR: Enemies are guaranteed to be Elite.
strings.ITWAVE_NAME_BASIC_HONORBRIGADE: Wave {0} - Augment of Brigade and Honor
strings.ITWAVE_DESC_BASIC_HONORBRIGADE: All enemies are elite and the same elite type.
strings.ITWAVE_DESC_BASIC_DEVOTION: Lemurian Eggs appear. Hatch them with an item.
strings.ITWAVE_DESC_BASIC_DELUSION: Risk your items on previously opened chests in a test of memory
strings.ITWAVE_DESC_BOSS_HONOR: Enemies are stronger and guaranteed to be Elite.
strings.ITWAVE_DESC_BOSS_KIN: Defeat a horde of many of the same monster.
strings.ITWAVE_DESC_BOSS_DISSONANCE: Enemies are stronger and appear outside their usual environments.
strings.ITWAVE_NAME_BOSS_DISSOFAKE: Wave {0} - Boss Augment of True Dissonance
strings.ITWAVE_DESC_BOSS_DISSOFAKE: All enemies are allowed to spawn.
strings.ITWAVE_DESC_BASIC_VOIDBEAR: Enemies block the first multiple instances of damage.
strings.ITWAVE_DESC_BASIC_BADLUCK: Your luck is decreased for the current wave.
strings.ITWAVE_DESC_BASIC_TONIC: Monsters have a short stat boost and are crippled afterwards.
strings.ITWAVE_DESC_BOSS_LEECH: Monsters heal on hit and have increased healing.
strings.ITWAVE_DESC_BOSS_LUNARVOIDELITE: Elites spawn as Perfected or Voidtouched.
strings.ITWAVE_DESC_BASIC_MALACHITE: All enemies spawn as weakened Malachites.
strings.ITWAVE_DESC_BASIC_BATTERY: Improper storage may cause serious harm.
strings.ITWAVE_DESC_BASIC_FAMILY_BEETLE: The ground begins to shift beneath you.
strings.ITWAVE_DESC_BASIC_FAMILY_LEMURIAN: The ground's temperature begins to rise.
strings.ITWAVE_NAME_BASIC_FAMILY_IMP: Wave {0} - Augment of the Red Plane
strings.ITWAVE_DESC_BASIC_FAMILY_IMP: A tear in the fabric of the universe.
strings.ITWAVE_DESC_BASIC_FAMILY_GUP: The air smells of sweet strawberries.
strings.ITWAVE_DESC_BASIC_FAMILY_CONSTRUCT: You have tripped an ancient alarm.
strings.ITWAVE_DESC_BASIC_FAMILY_PARENT: A familial bond is being interrupted.
strings.ITWAVE_DESC_BASIC_FAMILY_SOLUS: The whirring of wings and machinery.
strings.ITWAVE_DESC_BASIC_FAMILY_VERMIN: You have invaded rampant breeding grounds.
strings.ITWAVE_NAME_BOSS_FAMILY_DRONES: Wave {0} - Boss Augment of the Machines
strings.ITWAVE_DESC_BOSS_FAMILY_DRONES: Drones and machines fight against you.
strings.ITWAVE_DESC_BASIC_DEATHLUNAR: The ground gets covered in lunar flames.
strings.ITWAVE_DESC_BASIC_MANYITEMS: Monsters get higher stacks of items.
strings.ITWAVE_DESC_BASIC_HERESY: Enemies gain heresy items for the wave.
strings.ITWAVE_HERESY_ANNOUNCE_ARM: <style=cWorldEvent>[WARNING] Running test with <color=#307FFF>Hooks and Strides of Heresy</color></style>
strings.ITWAVE_DESC_BASIC_COFFEE: Enemies have increased movement and attack speed.
strings.ITWAVE_DESC_BASIC_KNOCKBACKFIN: Hits knock things into the air.
strings.ITWAVE_DESC_BASIC_LEPTON: Monsters spawning may unleash a healing aura.
strings.ITWAVE_DESC_BOSS_INFESTORS: A swarm of Void Infestors is gathering.
strings.ITWAVE_NAME_BOSS_MOUNTAIN: Wave {0} - Boss Augment of the Mountain
strings.ITWAVE_DESC_BOSS_MOUNTAIN: Defeat twice as many enemies for twice the rewards.
strings.ITWAVE_DESC_BASIC_PULSE_LUNAR: A crippling pulse is being emmited.
strings.ITWAVE_DESC_BASIC_PULSE_MALACHITE: Your healing will be disabled if pulsed.
strings.ITWAVE_NAME_BASIC_EQUIPMENTDRONE: Wave {0} - Augment of the Equipment Drone
strings.ITWAVE_DESC_BASIC_EQUIPMENTDRONE: A Equipment Drone has been released from the focus.
strings.ITWAVE_NAME_BOSS_EQUIPMENTDRONE: Wave {0} - Boss Augment of the Equipment Drones
strings.ITWAVE_DESC_BOSS_EQUIPMENTDRONE: Multiple Equipment Drones have been released from the focus.
strings.ITWAVE_DESC_BOSS_GHOST: A strong unknown horror haunts you.
strings.ITWAVE_NAME_BOSS_ACRID: Wave {0} - Boss Augment of Cell Breach
strings.ITWAVE_DESC_BOSS_ACRID: The subject is simulated, everything is under control.
strings.ITWAVE_DESC_BASIC_CELESTIAL: Enemies are invisible inside the sphere.
strings.ITWAVE_DESC_BOSS_HALCYONITE: Defeat Halcyonite in addition to the wave.
strings.ITWAVE_NAME_BOSS_SCAVLUNAR: Wave {0} - Boss Augment of the Twisted Scavenger
strings.ITWAVE_NAME_BOSS_FALSESON: Wave {0} - Boss Augment of the False Son
strings.ITWAVE_DESC_BOSS_FALSESON: Defeat the mockery of a greater being.
strings.ITWAVE_NAME_BOSS_SUPERBALL: Wave {0} - Boss Augment of the Alloy Worship Unit
strings.ITWAVE_NAME_BOSS_GIANTGUP: Wave {0} - Boss Augment of the Giant
strings.ITWAVE_NAME_BOSS_SUPERCRAB: Wave {0} - Boss Augment of the Devastator
strings.MOD_ITWAVE_NAME_BOSS_DIRESEEKER: Wave {0} - Boss Augment of the Direseeker
strings.SS2_ITWAVE_DESC_BASIC_COGNATION: Enemies leave behind temporary duplciates on death.
strings.MOD_ITWAVE_DESC_BASIC_TOSSING: Players can drop and scrap their items.
strings.ITWAVE_DESC_BASIC_ELIXIR: Enemies heal upon reaching low health.
strings.ITWAVE_DESC_BASIC_SHURIKEN: Enemies fire deadly shurikens when they attack.
strings.ITWAVE_DESC_BASIC_ENEMYSURVIVORS: Monsters are replaced by weak Umbras.
strings.ITWAVE_NAME_BOSS_DLC3_VULTUREHUNTER: Wave {0} - Boss Augment of the Hunt
strings.ITWAVE_NAME_BOSS_DLC3_SOLUSWING: Wave {0} - Boss Augment of Solus Wing
strings.ITWAVE_NAME_BOSS_DLC3_SOLUSHEART: Wave {0} - Boss Augment of Solus Heart
